settings.page_subtitle: If you’re looking for a distinctive and memorable corporate gift for staff or customers, we can help. We offer a range of corporate cheese hampers, corporate cheese gifts as well as online cheese and wine tasting hospitality events. To discuss any aspect of our corporate gifting and events service please get in touch on 01451823460 or email sales@paxtonandwhitfield.co.uk.

settings.content:
Corporate Cheese Hampers and Gifts

Choose from our carefully curated range of corporate cheese gifts - including cheese hampers and gift packs to thank your team and keep in touch with your valued customers, whether you are sending out to your small office team or a UK-wide corporate group. 

To discuss any aspect of our corporate gifting and events service please get in touch on 01451823460 or email sales@paxtonandwhitfield.co.uk.

Corporate Entertaining

Our team of expert cheesemongers will host online and in person cheese tastings for your clients. We will consult with you on content and decide which cheeses and format will work. For online cheese tastings, we will ensure that each participant has the same box delivered in time for the virtual tasting session. Price on application, please email jermynstreet@paxtonandwhitfield.co.uk for more information.
